summary: Implement real-time KYC/AML watchlist screening during customer signup to meet regulatory compliance. System must check new users against OFAC, EU, UN sanctions lists via vendor-agnostic integration with <3s response time. Features include: automated fallback to manual review if primary service fails (>5s latency), immutable audit logging, compliance dashboard, user status notifications, and full encryption. Deliverables: updated onboarding flow, provider integration docs, monitoring dashboard, manual review training. Critical for maintaining bank partnerships and regulatory compliance in expanding international markets.
